subject: Respond for your loan approval
body:
Dear Home-0wner

Are you fed up with paying too much mortgage interest?. Your loan approval is waiting.

You can receive $265.000 for 
$678 per month.

Please respond asap.
http://ilook.tw/kega





Gerald Jackson 
Mtg Approval Center


Lots of times you have to pretend to join a parade in which you're not really interested in order to get where you're going.	-Christopher Darlington Morley (1890-1957)
